title: Capsule closure has better hip function than non-closure in hip arthroscopy for femoracetabular impingement: A systematic review and meta-analysis
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Yang Lv, Meiping Yang, Cheng Hu, Da Guo, Caiqiong Zhao, Li Wei, Shuchai Xu, Dingkun Lin, Weiming Yang
